unnormalised: A major pile-up on the Mumbai-Pune Expressway resulted in over 20 injured being rushed to nearby hospitals earlier today. Initial reports suggest that heavy monsoon rains contributed to the accident, which occurred around 10:30 AM near Lonavala. The victims were taken to various hospitals, including the MGM Hospital and the local govt. hospital, with injuries ranging from minor cuts to severe fractures.
normalised: A major pile-up on the Mumbai-Pune Expressway resulted in over twenty injured being rushed to nearby hospitals earlier today. Initial reports suggest that heavy monsoon rains contributed to the accident, which occurred around ten thirty A-M near Lonavala. The victims were taken to various hospitals, including the M-G-M Hospital and the local government hospital, with injuries ranging from minor cuts to severe fractures.

unnormalised: Dr. Rajesh Kumar, CMO at MGM Hospital, stated that they received 12 patients. Of these, 3 are in critical condition and under observation in the ICU. One patient, identified as Mrs. Sharma, sustained a severe head injury and is currently undergoing a CT scan. The hospital staff is working tirelessly to provide the best possible care to everyone.
normalised: Doctor Rajesh Kumar, C-M-O at M-G-M Hospital, stated that they received twelve patients. Of these, three are in critical condition and under observation in the I-C-U. One patient, identified as Missus Sharma, sustained a severe head injury and is currently undergoing a C-T scan. The hospital staff is working tirelessly to provide the best possible care to everyone.

unnormalised: Local authorities have temporarily closed a section of the expressway to clear the wreckage and investigate the exact cause of the accident. Ambulances from Pune and Mumbai were dispatched immediately after receiving the emergency call. The NHAI officials estimate that the expressway will be reopened for traffic by 6 PM, depending on the weather conditions.
normalised: Local authorities have temporarily closed a section of the expressway to clear the wreckage and investigate the exact cause of the accident. Ambulances from Pune and Mumbai were dispatched immediately after receiving the emergency call. The N-H-A-I officials estimate that the expressway will be reopened for traffic by six P-M, depending on the weather conditions.

unnormalised: This incident highlights the importance of safe driving practices, especially during the monsoon season when visibility is poor and roads are slippery. Citizens are advised to check traffic updates before travelling and to drive cautiously, maintaining a safe distance from other vehicles. Contact the local police at 100 for any assistance.
normalised: This incident highlights the importance of safe driving practices, especially during the monsoon season when visibility is poor and roads are slippery. Citizens are advised to check traffic updates before travelling and to drive cautiously, maintaining a safe distance from other vehicles. Contact the local police at one hundred for any assistance.
